1615101046_1GJGEK5WyPcNoDx6LRy22CRqwB92R.body:
Today I am really disappointed and it comes from that :  

>In a draft resolution tabled on Wednesday “on Russia, the case of Alexei Navalny, the military build-up on Ukraine’s border and Russian attacks in the Czech Republic,” the group of mostly Eastern European lawmakers suggested that if the current tensions over Ukraine turn into an outright Russian invasion, imports of “oil and gas from Russia to the EU [must] be immediately stopped, while Russia should be excluded from the SWIFT payment system, and all assets in the EU of oligarchs close to the Russian authorities and their families in the EU need to be frozen and their visas cancelled.

https://thedailycoin.org/2021/04/29/brussels-wants-swift-shut-off-halt-to-russian-energy-use-if-ukraine-aggression-continues/

How the fuck is Russia still vulnerable to those people? That's the problem to me... 

It's a WAR ! they want it to remain invisible, but it's a full on war on mankind.

and so babbling around, pretending that all will return to order is a pure disillusion.

at least see the positive side, they have still not launched reasons for russian terminal retaliation, that's where we are...

a question did stalin read mein kampf before allying with hitler? (I don't know if there is a part about soviets etc, but I guess it wouldn't have been too hard to understand what was going on... I mean?!?).

and so this guidestone agenda? disregarded as stupid rocks nowhere?

and what about this russian girl fucking on a sacred mountain somewhere? what is going on?

I have the impression that some, always being in the "international arena, palaces, petit fours, best etc) forget... or don't see... or don't read the reports... 

best example in france is bordeaux... you go to the city center for a receptions, galas, speech etc, everything is splendid... go a little further... ahhh... datchas are better.

and I read some commentary about pervasive corruption in russia, at all level, docs, nurses etc... 

it's the trap of the extensive global plan, leaving a weak core...

while rome is being looted, the legions are strong in the outskirts, most don't know, don't understand, and don't want to believe... 

at least you still have a country in russia... dont't lose it.

"they" are coming for it.

China may not have "won ww2", but I am very confident, that now, those who seek to take over china, are in for the hell ride of their whole lives... I don't have the same confidence toward russia... show me a kill a list... executed, and continuously updated... yeah yeah... empire... and i am speaking inward. first front is the domestic enemies... I understand the weather is cold in winter etc... it's not a reason to betray the motherland ! and wha ever the reason, treason is execution.

and fundamentally I guess, there is still a belief about a peaceful, prosperous harmonious international order based on law... 

so why not let the ukrainians decide those laws? ahh. they are not legitimate? that's the argument... it's a little weak...

I remain convinced that trump speech writer nailed it : a constallation of nations... free, independent, sovereign, not trying to rule, influence, undermine, control, etc others... and there we can move forward...

the all narrative of covert great nation "competition"... it ends in front line, nuked armed, for those surviving the shadows war... 

it's a mindset... who is the fuck to tell the saudis how to live? what the fuck? who in this fucking world to go somewhere, foreign, and impose "international law" on an other people? madness... like criminalizing a plant of planet... 

back to earth... 

in my modest opinion it's a fundamental problem of management, specially of public entity : how to fire public workers, who didn't nothing wrong, but simply their program is terminated. retooling, shifting line of work etc... internal dynamism, rather to losing oneself in a total war for the control of medina... 

it is so easy to see for france... but a dream, ideals, etc, hiding lies, for the self enrichement, engrandizement of certain individual profiting from it, sometimes at the direct expanse of the native people, and most of the time indirectly affecting them negatively...

the lion pride... so it's a lion who waste is all days trying to conquer the land of another tribe, to not see what is going on in his own pack.

focus on the nest !

basic example why the fuck is russia inside the european court of human rights? what is this crazynes? who had such an idea? in china, supreme court of china end. we won't let the sovereignty in regards of china to anyone, what so ever... aliens included. there will be ups, there will downs, but forward !
pipelines are another good example... they pay, they get. they don't pay, they don't get. end. transactional. not trans national.... transactions... al... wysiwyg. china.

all this influence / value is not only fucking the mind of the enemies... adversaries, competittors... again what the fuck : you want to learn kung fu, go to kung fu school. (yes it can super hard, what, you want to learn kung fu or not?) you see? simplicity. for harmony... no bullshit on lie, on plans, on variations... everyone is lost at the end.

and the final issue and the most important : IN THE CHINESE SPACE PROGRAMS WE SPEAK THE OFFICIAL LANGUAGE OF THE OFFICIALS. it's very simple, even it's looks complicated. there is a language, among the many thousand in china, that is the language of the officials. this is the language used. you can use what you want in your daily lives, but in and with the officials, it's the official language. this language has more tradition, history, etc, that all the other languages in the world, it's not about exterminating your identities and culture and what ever, translate the concepts that may still be foreign to the official language, openess, always, and moving on. otherwise it's chaos.

and don't enter this superiority, inferiority complex... the fucking Khan... you know... the great one? fucking learned it. it's like this. so think about all of this... thank you very much, have a nice week end, and I am not linda kinkade :).

1619803098_1NJcfEP5FK4bJrR2Kfb4t5hNP9ox4.body:
Oceanic sNailing? 

"Whelk (also known as scungilli) is a common name that is applied to various kinds of sea snail. True whelks are carnivorous, feeding on worms, crustaceans, mussels and other molluscs, drilling holes through shells to gain access to the soft tissues. Whelks use chemoreceptors to locate their prey.

Its adaptations include a modified radula (a toothed chitinous structure) to bore holes in the shells of prey, complemented by an organ on the foot which secretes a shell-softening chemical. When a hole has been formed paralyzing chemicals and digestive enzymes are secreted inside the shell to break the soft body down into a 'soup' which can be sucked out with the proboscis. The plates of barnacles can be pushed apart with the proboscis, and the entire individual is eaten in about a day, although larger animals such as mussels may take up to a week to digest.

Mussels have developed a defensive strategy of tethering and immobilising with byssus threads any dog whelks invading their beds, leading to the whelks' starvation.

Dog whelks were used in antiquity to make a rich red dye that improves in color as it ages."
